name: golden-gate-assembly
title: Golden Gate Assembly Simulation
description: Simulate Golden Gate assembly to predict final construct sequences
content:
Overview

This application simulates Golden Gate assembly by predicting the final assembled sequence from backbone and insert fragments.

Features

  • Multi-fragment assembly
  • Overhang matching
  • Fragment order determination
  • Full sequence prediction

Parameters

  • Backbone Sequence: Destination vector
  • Enzyme: Type IIS enzyme used
  • Fragments File: JSON file with fragment definitions
  • Topology: Circular or linear backbone

Fragment Format

Upload a JSON file with fragment definitions. Each fragment should have either:
(1) "name", "fwd_oligo", "rev_oligo" keys, OR
(2) "name", "sequence" keys (for double-stranded fragments)

Output

Returns assembled sequence and assembly details including fragment order and success status.
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && pip install -q biopython biomni && python prod_apps_clone/biomni/molecular_biology/golden_gate_assembly.py "${backboneSequence}" "${enzyme}" "${fragmentsFile}" ${linear} -o "${outputDir}"
